Class SchoolBoardContainer

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node

it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.SchoolBoardContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
JavaFXRescalable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class SchoolBoardContainer extends RescalableAnchorPane
Class SchoolBoardContainer represent the container for the SchoolBoardPane

  • Constructor Details

    • SchoolBoardContainer

      public SchoolBoardContainer(boolean isPrimary, String ownerNickname, String teamName, int coins)
      Constructor creates the SchoolBoardContainer
      Parameters:
      isPrimary - (type boolean) true if the SchoolBoardPane is owned by the current Player
      ownerNickname - (type String) owner's nickname
      teamName - (type String) the player's team name, or null if no team exists
      coins - (type int) Player's coins (-1 means no-coin mode)
